question: @everyone What is the most illegal thing you'd do for $250,000?
@everyone Name one song you'd delete from existence if you could?
@everyone Sex is great and all, but have you tried _____?
@everyone If you have sex with Donald Trump once, you'll receive 10 million dollars OR be able to end world hunger. Would you do it? Which one would you pick?
@everyone Happy Canada Day/Memorial Day to our maple syrup-loving members. What is your favorite breakfast food and would you add maple syrup to it?
@everyone Each day you need to drink a glass of your own urine. Each day you get $10,000 — how many days until you call it quits?
@everyone You have to walk through a minefield with a 50% chance you'll live, or choose to be paralyzed from the waist down for life. Which do you choose?
@everyone Happy 4th of July! Name a place that is on your bucket list and what is preventing you from going there?
@everyone Would you rather be broke and have no one to hate, or be rich and have no one to love?
@everyone Would you rather lose an eye or have stomach cramps every day for 3 hours straight?
@everyone Would you rather have to always wear shoes that are three sizes too big, or always wear shoes that are one size too small?
@everyone Delete one ice cream flavor from existence — which flavor shall never return?
@everyone How much would someone have to pay you to go bald for one year?
@everyone In order to save your pet’s life, you have to kill your best friend's pet. There's a 50% chance they never find out it was you. Do you do it?
